Head.title: $BITF
Head.desc: Learn about the $BITF coin and its utility, distribution, airdrops and how to acquire BITF.

Header.title: $BITF
Header.desc: Learn about and acquire the $BITF coin

DFICoinSection.title: $BITF coin
DFICoinSection.desc: The $BITF coin is an integral unit of account in FateChain. The FateChain Foundation issued roughly 21 million BITF on SEP 15th, 2022. The current circulating supply (with staking and liquidity mining) is available at
DFICoinSection.disclaimer: Important: FateChain is a community project. There was/is no Initial Coin Offering, only free airdrops

Fees.title: Fees
Fees.desc: Pay for transactions, smart contracts and other DeFi activities

LoanCollaterals.title: Loan collaterals
LoanCollaterals.desc: Lend or borrow using crypto assets as collateral

StakingNodes.title: Staking nodes
StakingNodes.desc: Fund a new staking node for just $100 worth of BITF

BudgetProposal.title: Community fund proposal
BudgetProposal.desc: Submit a community fund proposal for 10 BITF (non-refundable)

LiquidityPools.title: Liquidity pools
LiquidityPools.desc: Provide liquidity for the decentralized exchange between crypto assets

DistributionSection.title: Initial Token Distribution
DistributionSection.desc: Of the 21 million $BITF coins, 49% will be in the initial supply, with the rest issued to node holders over time.

chart.desc: Of the initial supply, 26% of the tokens have been airdropped, <0>27% burned</0>, and <1>47% destroyed</1>.

ExchangeSection.title: Acquiring $BITF coins
ExchangeSection.desc: $BITF coins will be issued to users and partners with an interest in utilizing and participating in the ecosystem

Exchanges.title: Exchanges
Exchanges.desc: You can now purchase BITF at these select exchanges, with more exchanges to follow

Staking.title: Staking
Staking.desc: BITF is now available at these staking platforms

ERC20Section.title: Bitfate BEP20
ERC20Section.desc: The Bitfate BEP20 is a bridge between both ecosystems, allowing more Binance-based users to experience the real value of Native BITF on FateChain. Learn more <0>here</0>.
